messages.message: Is there a simple example of split_classifier as apply_classifier in flow -- the goal is to split the file in two doc types and apply the corresponding refiner -- for example: assume we have ADP paystub and a W2 in a single doc -- the goal of the classifier is to split it into two docs (assume we already have ADP.ibrefiner and W2.ibrefiner). Also assume that we already have the classifier logic to give page range for each class (ADP and W2) -- just need help in plumbing pieces.
just to close to loop -- this has been answered
